app.name: AI Agent for Zendesk
app.short_description: Get the ultimate AI Agent that be a co-pilot for your support team, and even handle Tier 1 tickets
app.long_description: Add an AI agent to your team. Get eesel AI to leave internal notes with a draft reply for all incoming tickets. You can also get it to leave external replies, and automatically escalate to humans as needed.
app.installation_instructions: Simply click the install button, and you'll be guided by the onboarding.
